h1_title: Best Settings on PS5 and PC
content: Starting on PC, there are a ton of options you can dive into to get the most out of the visuals and frames from Black Myth Wukong. If you have a mid-tier or lower GPU you can get the easiest performance boosts by simply turning **ray tracing off.** You will need to restart the game completely when turning ray tracing on or off for it to take effect.**If you still are having issues, look into turning down Shadow Quality, Visual Effects, and Hair** as your first stop as these will net you the highest performance boost when turned down. More on those in a moment.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Settings_on_PS5_and_PC.md', within the main section titled 'Best Settings on PS5 and PC'.
The content is as follows:
Starting on PC, there are a ton of options you can dive into to get the most out of the visuals and frames from Black Myth Wukong. If you have a mid-tier or lower GPU you can get the easiest performance boosts by simply turning **ray tracing off.** You will need to restart the game completely when turning ray tracing on or off for it to take effect.**If you still are having issues, look into turning down Shadow Quality, Visual Effects, and Hair** as your first stop as these will net you the highest performance boost when turned down. More on those in a moment.
